Package roles

Class Architect

java.lang.Object
core.Person
roles.ConstructionWorker
roles.ConstructionManager
roles.Architect
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPerson, java.io.Serializable
public class Architect
extends ConstructionManager
The architect manages every construction and therefore there is only one instance. This role will create and distribute constructions.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • createConstruction

      public Construction createConstruction​(java.lang.String constName, java.lang.String notes, java.lang.String size, SceneManager manager)
      Method for creating constructions and its tasks, depending on the selected size. When the construction is ready, then find a construction manager, who is not occupied and assign this job to it.
      Parameters:
      constName - What construction name did the user type in the form
      notes - What notes did the user leave
      size - How big of a construction did the user select
      manager - Where will the construction be rendered
      Returns:
      Construction
